name: Kickflip
description: The board flips vertically using a toe kick while airborne.

name: Heelflip
description: The board flips vertically using a heel flick while airborne.

name: Pop Shuvit
description: The board rotates 180 degrees horizontally underfoot without flipping.

name: 360 Pop Shuvit
description: The board makes a full 360-degree horizontal rotation underfoot.

name: Frontside 180
description: A 180-degree rotation where the front side faces the direction of travel.

name: Nollie Kickflip
description: Kickflip executed from a nose-ollie stance.

name: Switch Heelflip
description: Heelflip performed in the opposite stance of your regular footing.

name: Old School Kickflip
description: Classic 80s-style kickflip with front foot extended further back.

name: Gap Kickflip
description: Kickflip executed while clearing a gap between obstacles.

name: Fakie 360
description: Full 360-degree body rotation while riding in fakie stance.

name: Nollie 180
description: 180-degree rotation initiated from a nose-ollie position.

name: 360 Flip
description: Combination of a kickflip with a 360-degree shuvit rotation.

name: Gap Ollie
description: Basic ollie executed to clear a gap between two surfaces.

name: Fakie Bigspin
description: 360-degree board spin combined with a 180-degree body varial in fakie stance.
